func:
let eventList = {
    "1": "Access denied: Antipassback violation",
    "2": "Access denied: A second cardholder is required",
    "3": "Access denied: Denied by access rule",
    "4": "Access denied: Max occupancy reached",
    "5": "Access denied: Expired credential",
    "6": "Access denied: First-person-in rule supervisor absent",
    "7": "Access denied: Inactive cardholder",
    "8": "Access denied: Interlock",
    "9": "Access denied: Invalid PIN",
    "10": "Access denied: Invalid RFID",
    "11": "Access denied: Invalid BT PHONE",
    "12": "Access denied: Invalid LINKEY",
    "13": "Access denied: Invalid VIKEY",
    "14": "Access denied: Lost credential",
    "15": "Access denied: Stolen credential",
    "16": "Access denied: Unknown credential",
    "17": "Access denied: Out of schedule",
    "18": "Antipassback violation",
    "19": "Antipassback violation forgiven",
    "20": "Access denied: Double credential requred ",
    "21": "Access denied: Double credential timeout",
    "22": "Entry assumed",
    "23": "Entry detected",
    "24": "Access granted",
    "25": "Entry",
    "26": "Exit",


    "116": "Door closed",
    "117": "Door opened",
    "118": "Door forced open",
    "119": "Door open too long",
    "120": "Request to exit",
    "121": "Door manually unlocked",
    "122": "Door manually locked",
    "123": "Door manually Scheduled mode",
    "124": "Door locked",
    "125": "Door unlocked"
}



function constructOutput(key) {
    return key + ": " + eventList[key]
}


let eventInfoWrapper = {}
let eventInfo = {}

eventInfo = msg.payload.info
eventInfo.Event_id = constructOutput(eventInfo.Event_id)

eventInfoWrapper.payload = {}
eventInfoWrapper.payload.command = "addData"
eventInfoWrapper.payload.arguments = [eventInfo, true]

return eventInfoWrapper;

name: sendMqttMessage
func:
let userCreds = global.get('userCreds');
let globalTopic = userCreds.deviceAddr + "/"

let msgWrapper = {}
msgWrapper.operator = "SetCtpDoor"
msgWrapper.session_id = "0"
msgWrapper.message_id = Math.floor(Math.random() * 1692797271182).toString();;
msgWrapper.info = Object.assign(global.get('device_set_idxs'), global.get('stpDoorSet'))

msg.payload = msgWrapper
msg.topic = globalTopic + "Operate" + "/"

global.set('messageId', msgWrapper.message_id)

let ackSubtopic = {}
ackSubtopic.action = "subscribe"
ackSubtopic.topic = globalTopic + "Ack" + "/"

return [msg, ackSubtopic]

setTimezone
func:
let userCreds = global.get('userCreds');

let globalTopic = userCreds.deviceAddr + "/"

let msgWrapper = {}
msgWrapper.operator = "SetDateTime"
msgWrapper.session_id = "0"
msgWrapper.message_id = Math.floor(Math.random() * 1692797271182).toString();
msgWrapper.info = global.get('dTSet');

msgWrapper.info.DateTime = Date.now()
msgWrapper.info.GMT = 7200
msgWrapper.info.NTP1 = "pool.ntp.org"
msgWrapper.info.NTP2 = "pool2.ntp.org:123"
msgWrapper.info.DST_Shift = 3600


msg.payload = msgWrapper
msg.topic = globalTopic + "Operate" + "/"

global.set('messageId', msgWrapper.message_id)


return msg
